item.title: [DISTRELEC-5085] CH // Registration error
item.description:
When we try to register as new customer, it always leads to an error without any clear information

https://test.a.distrelec.ch/register/b2b

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5046] DE // Corrections Multiple RMA implementation
item.description:
Please adjust the following corrections for the multiple RMA page:

Tested with Chrome Version 36.0.1985.125
User: distrelec.testing+ade1@gmail.com
PW: distrelec

1. Step property should be named: Select items to return (not returr)
2. The gap between the item checkbox and the product image should be bigger
3. There are no return reasons or replacement reason selectable
4. The text on the cancel button should be in the center.
5. The text on the continue button should be in the center.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi,

The RMA reason and packaging are not yet ready for DE, the RMA feature is now available only for Movex countries.

FE changes done.
And also: Enable the Return Items link only if Order Status is 'ERP_STATUS_SHIPPED' or 'ERP_STATUS_RECIEVED'

Hi Ruben,
The return item link is not available anymore at all.
As you could see in the screenshot, the order is marked as shipped.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4889] Function and Department not transferred to SAP
item.description: During customer creation and change the Function and Department field are not transferred to SAP
item.summary: Function and Department not transferred to SAP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Nabil,
Please estimate and start.

Hi,

According to DISTRELEC-3898, there is no one to one mapping with ELFA values. The mapping was fixed already?
fixed

Could you please test?
Thx.

Hello Urs,
Could you please check that?

Hi Florian
I just made a test but I still get no department and function into SAP.
The customer I have created has the number 1241272.
Could you check again, please?

Hi Nabil
If I create a new customer both values are transferred corretly. But if I make an update in the shop both values are not transferred to SAP.
When I make an update in SAP just the function is changed in the shop but not the department.
Could you check this, please?
Many thanks

Hi Nabil
Were you already able to look into this issue?
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4743] Order as a guest - Link should exist as well on B2B check-out process
item.description:
Order as a guest exists only for Private Customers

Change is: if you are in the B2B section, not logged in, the possibility to change to B2C Guest order form should exist.

This link should prompt a message: Only B2C can order as guest, with 2 button: further or back. If the click Further the go to the existing form (order as guest), if not they go back to the previous page.
item.summary: Order as a guest - Link should exist as well on B2B check-out process

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please estimate

Estimation 1 day of FE work.
No BE needed
After click on "continue" in lightbox: redirect to https://test.distrelec.ch/login/checkout/register/guest of B2C channel.

Please confirm the display and the texts of the new lightbox (screenshot attached)

Note that translations are required

Thanks,
best regards
Waiting on translations
Translations attached. Note not all translations in the file are for this ticket - You'll figure out otherwise ask me.
